name: Planetary Deliver
description:
Planetary Deliver is a free roam educational package delivery game. You will learn cities, countries, vegetation, geography, etc...

Gameplay
So, basically, You have airplane and you work as a carrier/package delivery person! You get missions to deliver packages to certain locations against time/other player. For example to Helsinki, Finland. Do you know where is that place? If you don't, you will learn! You will be rewarded for successful deliveries. With money you can upgrade your airplane and buy new ones. Psst, be careful tornados are bad for airplanes.

  • Multiplayer
  • Nice graphics
  • Relaxing Gameplay
  • Super chill
  • Education
